text: Leonid Sergeyevich Bronevoy (; December 17, 1928 â€“ December 9, 2017) was a Nika Award-winning Soviet and Russian actor. He was known for his work in the Lenkom Theatre. Bronevoy also made occasional appearances in movies. He was named a People's Artist of the USSR in 1987. == References == ==Other websites== * Category:1928 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Russian actors
title: Leonid Bronevoy
